Knack for Success.name: Knack for Success
Knack for Success.flavor: Your mere presence is enough to tip the balance of fortune for you and your allies.
keywords:
Close burst 5

Target: You or one ally in the burst

Effect: Choose one of the following.
Knack for Success.target: You or one ally in the burst
Knack for Success.effect:
Choose one of the following.
    * The target makes a saving throw.
    * The target shifts up to 2 squares as a free action.
    * The target gains a +2 power bonus to his or her next attack roll made before the end of his or her next turn.
    * The target gains a +4 power bonus to his or her next skill check made before the end of his or her next turn.

Help Is Here.name: Help Is Here
Help Is Here.flavor: An encouraging word and subtle direction help an ally complete his or her task.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You successfully use the aid another action on an adjacent ally.
Help Is Here.effect: You successfully use the aid another action on an adjacent ally.

Sudden Switch.name: Sudden Switch
Sudden Switch.flavor: You whirl through melee, causing another combatant to be caught up in your dance while catching your enemies by surprise.
keywords:
Melee 1

Target: One creature

Effect: You and the target swap positions. Until the end of your next turn, you gain combat advantage against enemies adjacent to you after the swap.
Sudden Switch.effect: You and the target swap positions. Until the end of your next turn, you gain combat advantage against enemies adjacent to you after the swap.

Lockstep.name: Lockstep
Lockstep.flavor: Wherever you go, your friend follows.
keywords:
Close burst 1

Target: You and one ally

Effect: Each target can shift up to 6 squares as a free action. The targets must end this movement adjacent to each other.
Lockstep.effect: Each target can shift up to 6 squares as a free action. The targets must end this movement adjacent to each other.

Persuasive Words.name: Persuasive Words
Persuasive Words.flavor: You summon up your personal reserves and put everything into understanding the situation and getting the results you need.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: For 5 minutes or until the end of the encounter, you gain a +5 power bonus to Bluff, Diplomacy, Insight, and Intimidate checks.
Persuasive Words.effect: For 5 minutes or until the end of the encounter, you gain a +5 power bonus to Bluff, Diplomacy, Insight, and Intimidate checks.
